key_risks: Competitive pressures from major players like Rogers, Bell, and Comcast
Regulatory risks due to potential changes in telecommunications regulations
High debt levels from U.S. expansion and infrastructure upgrades
Technological disruption from the shift toward wireless and 5G services
controversies: Customer service and billing practices affecting customer retention and brand reputation
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing carbon footprint and advancing ESG goals
social_issues: Customer satisfaction issues and efforts to improve customer experience
governance_issues: Organizational restructuring to optimize focus on U.S. and Canadian operations
